name: Super Chicken Bros 4
description:
Super Chicken Bros. 4 is a boss rush style 2D topdown game in which you play as a baby chicken trying to rescue his family from an owl. Players must dash, attack and chirp their way to victory while collecting bits of an eggshell shield. 

Created by Hope Nasr, Cameron Meyer, Andrew Bond-Harris, and Andrew Sylvester for the Chillennium 2019 game jam.
